name: gridmap-layout-thailand
description: Positions of tiles for Thailand grid map visualization
author: Krist Wongsuphasawat <krist.wongz@gmail.com> (http://kristw.yellowpigz.com)

scripts.postcurate: node src/postcurate.js && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- src/output/gridmap-layout-thailand.js > src/output/gridmap-layout-thailand.min.js && cp src/input/*.* examples/data && cp src/output/*.* examples/data && cp src/output/gridmap-layout*.* dist
